Q: Let's do this in a Q&A format

A: Ok, let's go!

Q: Who are you?
A: I’m Giuseppe Saccardi, graduate in Mathematics for Life and Data Sciences at the University of Trento. Further, I am an AI/ML enthusiast, always guided by a strong willpower to learn!

Q: What do you do at the moment?
A: Currently, I am involved in the role of Data Scientist at Kebula, that is, an innovative startup, spin-off of the University of Salerno in collaboration with Kineton!

Q: Can you say something more about it?
A: Of course! Kebula is a fast-growing company specialized in solving Data Engineering and Analytics real-world-problems using modern AI tools!

Q: What are your plans for the future?
A: I’m always looking forward for new challenges and experiences! I’m planning to start a PhD program on Deep Learning and Energy-Based methods!

Q: Can you list some activities you are interested in?
A: In my free-time I love walking in nature, listening to Podcasts about tech, culture and news. I really enjoy spending time with my folks and visiting new places!

Do you want to get in touch with me? Feel free to send me an email at:

print "giuseppe.saccardi AT kebula.it".replace(' AT ','@')
